Description:
On HM6264 - Pin 26 is CS2 - Pull High
                         Pin 1 is Not Connected
On HM62256 - Pin 26 is A13
                           Pin 1 is A14
Need to modify J1 to use HM62256.

Used 32 pin socket to enable future 128K upgrade
27C512 (64k) or 27C010 (128k) - W27C512-45Z (Ebay)
Switch Cap - 13mm dia vs 9.9mm for original
